summary: EvalBMCS lacks full modal coherence required for bidirectional truth lemma. Three viable paths identified: (1) accept forward-only truth lemma (sufficient for completeness), (2) characterize axiom as recoverable proof debt, (3) align with task 857 eval-only pattern. BoxEquivalent would work but cannot be maintained under witness construction.

artifacts.summary: Analysis of EvalBMCS full modal coherence requirements, BoxEquivalent limitations, and alignment with task 857 temporal saturation pattern
